MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD11 postcode area of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.23am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to our underground electricity network near the Edrom substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:32pm on the 6th February 2021.
